name: Broke Santa
description:
"You can't just pick up gifts on the floor, or can you?"
-Bentot

You, Santa, became broke during this pandemic.  The only way he can get gifts for the children is to pick up gifts on the floor, the problem is, you're on a highway full of passing vehicles.  How many gifts can you pick up while dodging cars?  This is just a short game I made for this jam.  I'm not even sure if it looks 32 bit, I just made it for fun.

Controls:
A or Left Arrow Key - Move Left
D or Right Arrow Key - Move Right
S or Down Arrow Key - Go Down

Credits for Trevor Lentz and TheMindnaut for their music :)
